mapper.select: select to_char(enrolldt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as enrolldt, id, noticecode, to_char(noticeend,'YYYY-MM-DD') as noticeend, noticetitle from favoritentice where id=#{id} and noticeend>sysdate

select a.loanaccount, l.name as loanname,l.finalrate, c.principal, a.REPAYAMOUNT, a.account, u.alias, to_char(a.accountdt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as accountdt, to_char(A.DUEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as duedate from loanaccount a, loancontract c, hana_loan l, useraccount u where a.contractcode = c.contractcode and l.code = c.loancode and u.account=a.account and c.userid=#{id}
